scripts.install-common-lib: cd projects/common-lib && npm install && npm run-script build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run host" "npm run mfe1" "npm run mfe2"
scripts.install-common-lib-all: concurrently "cd projects/host-app && npm run-script install-common-lib" "cd projects/mfe1 && npm run-script install-common-lib" "cd projects/mfe2 && npm run-script install-common-lib"
scripts.start-all: npm run common-lib && npm run install-common-lib-all && npm run start
scripts.install-all-packages: npm install && npm run install-common-lib && concurrently "cd projects/host-app && npm install && npm run-script install-common-lib" "cd projects/mfe1 && npm install && npm run-script install-common-lib" "cd projects/mfe2 && npm install && npm run-script install-common-lib"
